website_summaries.verdict: Good looks and a nice price make this spa basket an excellent choice for gift-givers on a budget. Its pretty presentation and eight-piece collection of bath items make it a suitable gift for numerous occasions.
pros: Eight beautifully packaged bath items with purple theme that includes a purple basket and bow
Jasmine and lavender scents are fresh and relaxing, and have generated praise from recipients
Includes bath poufs and back-scrubbing loofah
cons: Some customers wish it were a bit larger

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my small bathroom to add a more spa like ambiance but it'd be a great holiday gift. It add a nice touch plus is great for one of those much needed wine and pampering night. It has a relaxing floral scent but not too overpowering. I'm sensitive to scents especially cheap smelling ones but this is good quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to a friend who was so thrilled to receive it. She started using is and said the products are great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: mikae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for someone special
customer_reviews.text: The basket was a gift for a friend and she loved it. All the ingredients were a perfect match I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: E. McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Tiny box
customer_reviews.text: It is very good but appears bigger on the picture and it is very small for the price
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift so I have not personally used the products included in the beautiful basket. However, the gift basket came on time and wrapped very well. The products looked great and plentiful. My sister loved it and will let me know when she uses it, I’m sure. I’m giving it five stars for the presentation, packaging, products, and the anticipation of a wonderful “spa day” for my sister!
customer_reviews.author: D. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for gifting
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift for a patient of mine that’s in the hospital. A lot nicer stuff in this basket than hospital brand products.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great soothing variety!
customer_reviews.text: Susan, I sent this gift to a friend, Molly and she was so complimentary & pleased I just ordered another as a gift for my friend, Cathy. Both of these friends are nurses, working hard. Molly is a NP working as a hospitalist in a very busy ER in PA. Please keep them in your prayers! Carol Esfahanian RN
customer_reviews.author: travelnurse

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a review as this was a gift I gave
customer_reviews.author: gr8rytre

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: I gave the basket as a gift. The products were very nice and the recipient said they had a great lavender scent. I had to repackage it before I gave it because the cellophane wrapper made the gift look like it came from a dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kufner

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality
customer_reviews.text: Not really that impressed and don’t feel value for money was worth it. Cheap quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: J Martins

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Basket
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice gift basket. I gave it to my granddaughter for her birthday. A loofah back scrubber and bath puffs are included. Shipping was timely. I will purchase fro. JAF Products again.
customer_reviews.author: Francina

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my daughter so I personally have not used it. Definitely a lovely variety, beautiful aroma. She says she absolutely loved it and would consider buying it for herself or a gift.
customer_reviews.author: jackson

customer_reviews.title: my mother in law
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother-in law and she loves it,the whole basket was full of Lavender products,well worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift & she loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a friend. She absolutely loved it! Enjoyed all the contents & thought it was beautifully packaged. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Comment on Basket
customer_reviews.text: The product was beautifully packaged and received in a well secured shipping box. It was given as a Christmas gift and the young lady was very happy and praised how pretty it was and how nice the scent was when she opened. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Pookie888

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My mother loved the smell and presentation of the gift basket.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cook

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Lavender and Jasmine basket
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find Lavender and Jasmine together. I love the smell. I bought the basket for myself because of this. I would buy the Lavender and Jasmine Body Lotion all the time if I could find it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The presentation of the products
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my sister & my niece and they both were surprised & loved it. They couldn’t wait to try everything. They love the fragrance. Great gift, I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a basket for my mom on mother's day. She thoroughly enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: Guan Huan Fu

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice presentation and looked exactly as advertised. It was a Christmas present and was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift as a thank you. Very nice gift, packaged lovely
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P.

customer_reviews.title: It's as described
customer_reviews.text: This was for a friend she absolutely loved it I highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely should by
customer_reviews.text: Lovely for house decorations and it's smell great as well
customer_reviews.author: Kynnedi

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I used this a gift basket for a nursing home Christmas raffle. It's lovely and I know that whoever gets it will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Nice fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: The smell and display was very nice, but the pumps were not useable. Very dissappointed since it was a gift for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Segal

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gifting!
customer_reviews.text: Given for a Mother’s Day gift. Very nice presentation. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bath and Body carries reasonable good products.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this to be an inexpensive house warming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife on Mother’s Day and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: The gift made my friends day!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my friend, she absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Childs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and arrived early
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it as her Easter basket this year - she's 22!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Banks

customer_reviews.title: Gift basket
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, and they liked it very much...Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a mother and two year old daughter. They love it. The little girl wouldn’t bathe with anything else loved the fragrance and colors. Same with the mother, used this everyday. Turned out this is a wonderful gift regardless of age.
customer_reviews.author: NetadminTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: beutiful gift baskeet
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift for my niece, she said it was in a beautiful basket, she said it smell great she hasn't used it yet, but was very impressed with what came in the basket..she said it would be more perfect if you added a candle, she said she loves taking baths and using her candles..just a thoughjt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for my wife. It was almost exactly what she wanted. She had also asked for exfoliating gloves which are not included. What is in the basket is just what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my mum, and she was quite happy with it. Lovely scent.
customer_reviews.author: Princess7

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Basket
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty basket. The actual basket was wire, and reusable! It was a gift so I can’t comment on the scent, but recipient was very pleased when they received it.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great bath variety
customer_reviews.text: Very good variety of bath products attractively packaged for a gift Fast shipping too
customer_reviews.author: andyl

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift basket
customer_reviews.text: This gift basket was neatly pack and looks nice. I haven’t opened it yet because it looks like a prop on the dresser.😊
customer_reviews.author: caprena

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: The product is very useful and makes a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Thom

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The basket was smaller than I expected, but it was nice
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Colon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she seemed to really love it.
customer_reviews.author: J Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Given as a Christmas present and it was loved .
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Greer

customer_reviews.title: Gift Basket
customer_reviews.text: This gift basket was for my sister in law. She reports that it is so pretty, she doesn't want to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ingels

product_meta.title: Home Spa Gift Baskets For Women - Bath and Body Gift Basket For Women and Men – Lavender and Jasmine Home Spa Set with Body Lotions, Bubble Bath, Bath Salt and Much More
product_meta.description:
Give yourself a spa treatment without leaving the comfort of your own home. The Lovery Lavender and Jasmine Bath & Spa Set includes everything you need to pamper yourself. This all-inclusive set features to look and feel beautiful. From shower gel to lotion you can indulge in the soothing scent of jasmine and fresh lavender.Our products are made with moisturizing Shea Butter & nutrient-rich Vitamin E Oil.

SET INCLUDES:

300ml Shower Gel
300ml Bubble Bath
200ml Body Lotion
100g Bath Salt
2pcs Bath Puff
Loofah Back Scrubber
Reusable Purple Basket

BENEFITS & FEATURES:

Lavender Jasmine is a soothing, addictive fragrance
Full 8 piece set contains an assortment of lush bath accessories
Beautifully wrapped & packaged for the ultimate presentation with a ribbon & tag
Blank lined gift note attached to write her a heartfelt message
Formulated with Shea Butter & Vit E to moisturize and protect
Purely sourced ingredients, clearly displayed on packaging
Lovery's items are PARABEN FREE and NEVER TESTED ON ANIMALS 

LUXURIOUS BATH SET!

Step up your beauty routine with this deluxe spa basket. It includes everything you need to spoil yourself from head to toe. Looking and feeling great is effortless when you have everything you need to fortify your skin with moisture. Take a relaxing bath using our relaxing bubble bath and exfoliating loofahs and scrubbers, and envelop yourself in the enriching scents of lavender and jasmine. Our bath set will leave you feeling beautiful from your head to your feet!

THE PERFECT GIFT FOR HER

Make her feel like a pampered princess. The refreshing scent will invigorate her senses and make her feel like she’s getting the full spa treatment right at home. Soothing aromas are perfect for rest and relaxation. It’s exactly what she needs and it’s perfect for any occasion.
feature_bullets: DELUXE 8 PIECE SET ♥ This spa gift basket has everything a woman needs! It includes Shower Gel, Bubble Bath, Body Lotion, Bath Salt, 2 Bath Poofs and a Loofah Back Scrubber. Packed in a stunningly wrapped basket, it also has a gift note card for you to personalize it.

RELAXING LAVENDER & CALMING JASMINE ♥ Indulge in the calming, relaxing effects of lavender essential oils combined with the therapeutic and healing scent of jasmine. Envelop yourself in world of serenity as you soak up in the tub with the best bath gels and lotions. Relieve stress, relax your body and calm your mind.

PUMP IT UP ♥ Take your relaxation to the next level and enjoy the added convenience of hand pump lotion bottles instead of squeeze bottles. Included are also 2 sponge puffs and a loofah back scrubber to help lather and exfoliate. Forever change your beauty regiment and invigorate your spirit.

PREMIUM QUALITY INGREDIENTS ♥ Every Lovery product is 100% Paraben and Cruelty-Free. These enriching beauty products are made with moisturizing Shea Butter and nourishing Vitamin E. They are safe even on sensitive skin! We’re confident you’ll fall in love with our beauty set, we’ve backed it with a 100% money back satisfaction guarantee.

PERFECT FOR HER ♥ It's the present any girl will love! Pamper and indulge the special lady in your life with a stunningly beautiful and elegant gift package. It makes a wonderful present for Birthdays, Holidays, Anniversaries, Christmas, Mother’s Day and Valentine’s Day. Bring a smile to your Girlfriend, Wife, Mother or Daughter.
